entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
